loans.name: Nuha

texts.en:
Nuha is a 44-years-old married woman from Atteel, a village near Tulkarm city. She is the mother of two sons and one daughter. Her husband earns a low income through his work. Nuha has opened a sewing workshop in her house where she makes traditional clothing. It is a good business and it supports the family with a good income. 

Nuha has taken a loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new sewing machine for her workshop. This will improve her work quality and also her income.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for her workshop.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Maribel works hard to support her family.

She has a seaweed culture business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fishing. Maribel is borrowing PHP 28,000 through NWTF in order to buy additional materials like plastic rope, bottles, etc for her business.

Maribel has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so that she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her seaweed culture business.

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
Ana, de 30 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado debido a problemas económicos no continuo estudiando, está acompañada desde hace 9 años, su pareja se dedica a la albañilería y la agricultura y tiene tres hijos.

Ana, se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde que se acompañó, porque no tenían suficientes ingresos económicos, ella le ayuda a trabajar para salir adelante, porque es la única manera de aportar ingresos a la casa, este trabajo prácticamente se lo ha enseñado su pareja y lo hace desde las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 11:00 a.m.  

Ana, necesita el crédito para comprar 6 sacos de abono y comprar fertilizantes para la milpa, ya que tiene plaga y esto le puede dañar por completo el cultivo, el crédito le ayudara mucho para preparan las milpas y para que sean productivas. 

Ana, sueña con que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y se preparen académicamente, para que sean unas personas de bien en el país.
texts.en:
Ana, 30 years old, studied through the 8th grade. She did not continue studying due to financial problems. She has been in a relationship for 9 years and her partner works in masonry and in agriculture and has 3 children.

Ana has been working in agriculture since the relationship began because they lacked sufficient income. She likes to work in order to get ahead because it is the only way to bring income into the home. This practical work has been taught to her partner and it is done between 6:00am until 11:00am. 

Ana needs the loan in order to buy 6 bags of compost and to buy fertilizer for the cornfields. It has pests and this can completely damage the crop. The loan will help a lot to prepare the cornfields to become productive.

Ana dreams that the children finish their studies and prepare academically to become good people of the country.

loans.use: to buy 6 bags of compost and to buy fertilizer for the cornfields.

loans.name: Dalia

texts.en:
Dalia is a 27-year-old married Lebanese woman living with her husband and two children, who are attending school. She is a housewife taking care of her children all the time. Her husband is the main income provider in the family to help them to live in good conditions. 

Today, given that her children will enter school very soon, she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to register them at school for the upcoming school year. 

The parents’ only target is to provide their children with a good educational path until graduation and help them become able to get good jobs that will give them a good income.

loans.use: to register her children at school for the upcoming school year

loans.name: Martin Eduardo

texts.es: Martín es un universitario de 37 años. Actualmente se encuentra en tramites para sacar su titulo profesional de la carrera de Psicología. El decidió estudiar esta carrera porque le muestra un panorama muy amplio en el cual puede relacionarse con las personas. Comente que quiere especializarse en Psicólogo Industrial-Organizacional. Ademas de ser una persona capaz de alcanzar sus sueños trabaja como taxista para que así pueda obtener otros ingresos y poder sobresalir. El solicito el préstamo para sacar su titulo profesional y así poder trabajar en su especialidad. Se  siente muy agradecido con las personas que le puedan ayudar a cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Martín is a 37-year-old college student. Currently, he is in the process of obtaining his professional degree with a major in Psychology. He decided to study this field because it shows him a very wide panorama, and with this he is able to be in contact with and relate to people. He says that he would like to specialize in Industrial-Organizational Psychology. 

In addition to being a person capable of achieving his dreams, he works as a taxi driver so that he can earn other income and stand out. He is requesting a loan to get his professional degree, and be able to work in his specialty. He feels very thankful to the people who are able to help him achieve his goals.

loans.use: to get his professional degree.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Hi there lenders! 

Melanie sends her utmost gratitude as you allowed her have a financial support that indeed helped her in her small sari-sari store business. Now, she wants you to know that she still wants to continue her business operations. 

The problem there is that she doesn't have the full capacity to have enough capital to do so. With this, she asks to borrow a loan amounting to PHP 20,000 that she would use to buy an additional stock of grocery items to sell. The main reason behind this expansion is that she wants to gain higher profit that would surely help her family to at least have better support for their daily expenses. 

She really hopes for your helping hands. 

Melanie dreams of being successful in the years to come, especially in her business. At the same time, she dreams that her children will finish their studies as well. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members every week to share stories of their work. There she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy an additional stock of grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of rattan to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy-and-sell vegetables and spices business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to purchase an additional stock of vegetables and spices to sell for her buy-and-sell vegetables and spices business.

Emily has been in this business for five years. She earns more income from raising livestock.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. 

She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase an additional stock of vegetables and spices to sell

loans.name: Concha

texts.es:
Concha con trabajo y dedicación ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia  de cuatro integrantes de los cuales son dos mujeres y dos varones  ellos viven en una comunidad de San Andrés Semetabaj, para Concha no hay nada más importante que la seguridad de su familia es por ello que se dedica a la elaboración de güipiles típicos desde hace tres años, gracias a esta labor ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia, para Concha remodelar su casa ha sido su más grande deseo pues con el paso de los años se ha ido deteriorando por lo que ahora se ve a la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para poder comprar cemento, cal, arena, piso y láminas para poder dejar su casa en muy buenas condiciones y ofrecerle a su amada familia una mejor calidad de vida.
El gran sueño de Concha es finalizar la remodelación de su casa lo más pronto posible.
texts.en:
Concha has managed to move her family forward through work and dedication. Her family is made up of four people; two women and two men. They live in a community in San Andrés Semetabaj. For Concha, there is nothing more important than the security of her family, and it's for this reason that she has made a living making güipiles (regional dresses/blouses) for three years. Thanks to this work, she has managed to support her family. 

For Concha, remodeling her home has been her biggest desire, since it has deteriorated with the passing of years. Now, she is in need of a loan to be able to buy cement, lime, sand, flooring, and sheet metal so she can leave her house in very good condition and offer her beloved family a better quality of life. Concha's greatest dream is to complete the remodeling of her house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy materials such as cement, lime, sand, flooring and sheet metal.

loans.name: Idalia Carolina

texts.es: Idalia de 28 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijas de 12 y 6 años de edad a quienes con gran esfuerzo les brindan sus estudios. Idalia  se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos como pastelitos de carne, yuca frita, enchiladas y papas fritas, además su esposo se dedica a la albañilería  y juntos han logrado sacar adelante a sus hijas. Idalia está solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para la compra de una lámpara solar ya que en la comunidad donde ella reside no cuenta con luz eléctrica y con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder comprar la lámpara la cual es una estación de carga con energía de paneles solares en forma de lámpara que sirve para los hogares de zonas rurales donde no poseen energía eléctrica, con esta compra se podrán beneficiar con su familia ya que por las noches podrán tener luz que les ilumine y les haga sentirse más seguras.
texts.en:
Idalia, who is 28 years old, lives in her own house together with her husband and their two daughters, who are 12 and 6 years old and put great effort into their studies. Idalia makes a living by selling typical snacks, such as meat pies, fried cassava, enchiladas and french fries. His husband is a bricklayer and together they have managed to get their daughters ahead.

Idalia is requesting a loan from FUSAI for the purchase of a solar lamp, as in the community where she lives there is no electric light and with her income she cannot afford to purchase the lamp, which is a charging station with solar panels in the shape of a lamp and is useful for homes in rural areas with no electricity. With this purchase, their family will be able to benefit, as in the evenings they will have light to make them feel safer.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp to benefit with its light in the evenings

loans.name: Four Queens Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Four Queen está conformado por cuatro mujeres emprendedoras, coordinado por Francisca de 27 años, de edad Madre soltera de dos hijos quienes son su mayor motivación para salir adelante, ella se dedica la venta de fritanga desde hace cinco años, uno de sus metas es desarrollar el negocio, por esta razón solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, aceite, carne, repollo, vegetales y tortilla. Ella solicita por octavo ciclo el financiamiento en ADIM, con los créditos anteriores logro la compra de nuevos instrumentos de cocina, la segunda socia es Aura de 29 años quien se dedica a la venta de ropa, la tercer socia es Tania de 27 años quien se dedica a la venta de ropa, la cuarta socia es Saray de 39 años quien se dedica a la venta de ropa.
texts.en:
The group Four Queen is made up of four entrepreneurial women, and coordinated by Francisca who is 27 years old. She is the mother of two children who are her biggest motivation to get ahead. She has made a living selling fried food for 5 years. One of her goals is to grow her business, and for this reason she is requesting a loan to buy rice, oil, meat, cabbage, vegetables, and tortillas. 

This is her eighth loan cycle with ADIM, and with previous loans she managed to buy new kitchen equipment. The second member is Aura, who is 29 years old and makes a living selling clothes. The third member is Tania, who is 27 years old and also makes a living selling clothes. The fourth member is Saray, who is 39 years old and also makes a living selling clothes.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, meat, cabbage, vegetables, and tortillas.

loans.name: Crispina

texts.en:
Crispina is 54 years old, married and works very hard to help her husband to earn in a living.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock such as soap, chips, shampoo, bread, etc.

Crispina has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future, Crispina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock such as soap, chips, shampoo, bread, etc

loans.name: Neema Kimara Group

texts.en:
Rose is 45 years old and unmarried. She has one son who is in school. For the past four years, Rose had supported her family with a food-selling business commonly known as mamalishe. She serves rice, stiff porridge with meat, beans, vegetables, soup with chapati, and mtori, which is cooked banana with meat mixed together as porridge. Rose starts working at five in the morning and she works until eight at night and is able to earn a good monthly profit. 

Rose is requesting a loan to buy baking flour, maize flour, charcoal, cooking oil, and sugar for her mamalishe business. She will share her loan with her group “Neema Kimara,” which consists of three members who will all hold each other accountable for repaying their loan. This will be Rose’s fourth loan with Tujijenge Tanzania and she repaid her previous loans successfully. She used her previous loans to start her current business and she is now doing great and her business is expanding. In the future, Rose dreams of improving her business and her life. She will use the profit from her loan to cover her family’s living costs and pay school fees for her son.

loans.use: to buy baking flour, maize flour, charcoal, cooking oil, and sugar

loans.name: Hala

texts.en:
Hala is a 36 year old Lebanese single woman living with her parents. She works together with her brother in order to satisfy their needs and improve their lifestyle. She works as a housekeeper according to her clients' demands. Today, with the aim of helping her sister pay her study fees, she is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l.

In the future, she plans to take more Kiva loans and help her sister continue her education.

loans.use: to pay her sister's study fees.

loans.name: Leomer

texts.en:
He is Leomer, 34, from Silang, Cavite, Philippines. He is happily married to Madeline, a bank teller. The couple both work work to make ends meet and to send their children to school. Leomer thought of a shuttle service to augment their income.

Leomer has a van and uses it for his shuttle service from Cavite to Makati. Few people own a car and most Filipinos commute from their house to their workplace. He already has regular passengers from the town. His van carries around twelve passengers.

To help him continue operation of his business, Leomer is requesting a PHP 15,000 loan which he will use for maintenance of his van. It is very important that his van is always in good running condition to ensure efficient service. He thanks God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given him for it will surely help provide for their daily needs and the educational needs of his children.

Leomer hopes that his transport service will continue to be successful. He wants all his children to get a College Education. He prays for God to make all of his trips safe for him and his passengers. Every week, he faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship members* to share stories of his work and draw strength and inspiration from the word of God he studies.

* All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his van for his shuttle service.

loans.name: Luân

texts.en:
Luân is 28 years old and married. He lives in Quang Xuong district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province. For the past 10 years, Luân has worked raising poultry. His family’s income is low and his job is unstable. Luân’s family has a two-hole latrine. One of his most critical difficulties is that his latrine is not hygienic.

Luân is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet. This will be Luân’s first loan with the Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. In the future, Luân hopes for his business to do well, for his family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet

loans.name: Vivencia

texts.en:
Vivencia works hard to support her family. Vivencia is married and has a dried fish making business in the Philippines. Vivencia has been in this business for 5 years now.

She requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to make dried fish.

In the future, Vivencia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to make dried fish

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
A lot more waits for Helen. She recently received a 10,000 PHP loan and started improving her business. Because of your wide and helping hands, Helen was able to increase the profits from her business selling DVDs. Her family has improved their living conditions. 

Helen is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan to purchase more quantities of DVDs to sell. Her loan will provide a good opportunity for her to continue the race and explore different avenues to success. She just prays that your unwavering support for her won't vanish. Helen’s vision for the future includes investing in a house and property and she does everything she can to work toward this. She is a woman who is determined to win and believes that there is no failure, just delayed success. Helen meets weekly with her fellowship* co-members to share stories of her work and draw strength and inspiration from studying the Word of God.
 
* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to purchase DVDs to sell

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en:
Mrs. Hoa is 33 years old and she is married. Hoa lives in Quang Xuong district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoá province.
 
Hoa has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 10 years. Her family is a low-income household in their village; moreover this job is unstable.

Hoa's family has a 2-hole latrine. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is the latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

This is Hoa's first loan with Thanh Hoá Microfinance Institution.

With her business profit, Hoa hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Cornilla

texts.en:
Cornilla is 61 years old and married with five children. For the past five years, she has been a vegetable farmer in the Philippines. Cornilla has borrowed and repaid 12 previous loans from NWTF and Kiva to sustain her business.

Cornilla is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies. She is working tirelessly toward attaining her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and farm supplies

loans.name: Bermetkan

texts.ru: Берметкан, 50 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее среднее образование, 10 лет занимается торговлей национальной одежды. Ежемесячная прибыль Берметкан от бизнеса около 21,000 сом (KGS). Берметкан решила обратиться в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку товара для увеличения ассортимента. Доходы от кредита Берметкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, что поможет ей улучшить благосостояние семьи и накопить на покупку мебели для дома.
texts.en: Bermetkan is 50, married, and the mother of two children.  She has a secondary education and she has been selling traditional dresses for 10 years.  Thanks to her business, she makes a monthly income of about 21,000 som (KGS).  She has decided to turn to Bai Tushum Bank and she is requesting a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy merchandise in order to increase her inventory.  She is planning to use the proceeds from her loan to further develop her business, which will help her to improve her family's well-being and will also allow her to save some money to buy furniture for her house.

loans.use: to buy traditional Kyrgyz clothes for retail sale in her shop.

loans.name: Emprendedoras Del Norte Group

texts.es:
Mercedes es una mujer de 48 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y su negocio es la pintura en tela.
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, paciente, optimista, dedicada, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza de forma ambulante en la zona ‘Mutualista’ un lugar céntrico caracterizado por el cambódromo, un espacio con capacidad para 30mil personas dónde se realiza; el corso de carnavales, desfiles y otras actividades culturales. De clima cálido sub tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Mercedes es de tez trigueña, ojos marrones, cabello castaño largo lo usa amarrado, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que desarrolla (la primera de la derecha, viste polera celeste y pantalón corto blanco). Su vida la disfruta en compañía de sus familiares que trabajan, viven en un cuarto propio construido de ladrillo y cemento que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. La necesidad por ampliar su negocio la llevó a formar una banca de personas con negocios como; artesanía en cerámica, venta de productos naturales, taller de llaves, taller de soldadura, venta de cosméticos, 
salón de belleza y venta de comida, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus actividades. Su negocio es la pintura en tela, que es una de las actividades manuales más sencillas y al mismo tiempo que dan grandes resultados, sus especialidades son los retratos de figuras famosas como artistas o cuadros como la monalisa, “la realidad es que no es necesario tener grandes técnicas o dotes pictóricas para lograr cambios y diseños lindos…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que los trabajos los realiza a pedido, la desventaja es la falta de capital para poder invertir y mejorar sus ventas. Su sueño es abrir un puesto de venta bajo techo, ella desea invertir en su negocio mediante la compra de material de pintura en tela como; pinturas, pinceles, tela, y otros. Esta es la 3 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Mercedes solicita un préstamo para la compra de material de pintura en tela para abrir un puesto de venta bajo techo.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a 48-year-old woman, who is single with no children, and her business is painting on canvas.

She is entrepreneurial, independent, patient, optimistic, dedicated, responsible, and very hardworking. She operates her business by traveling throughout the area 'Mutualista', a centrally-located area known for the cambódromo, which is a space with a capacity to fit 30,000 people. In this area, carnivals, parades, and other cultural activities take place. The climate here is warm and sub-tropical with a temperature that varies between 21-35 degrees centigrade during the day.

Mercedes has light brown skin, brown eyes, and long brown hair that she wears tied up. She is short in stature, with a robust physique. Her native language is Guaraní, which she speaks with her family. She also speaks Spanish for general purposes and in her business (she is the first on the right in the photo, with a light blue polo and white shorts). She enjoys life in the company of her family that works. They live in their own room made of brick and cement, and it has potable water, electricity, and a sewage system. The need to expand her business has motivated her to form a group with other people in businesses such as: ceramic crafts, natural product sales, a key-making shop, a welding shop, cosmetic sales, a beauty salon, and food sales. This group's purpose is to request a loan together and improve their businesses. 

Mercedes's business is painting on canvas, which is one of the simplest manual activities, but at the same time gives great results. Her specialties are the portraits of famous people such as artists or famous paintings such as the Mona Lisa. "The reality is that it is not necessary to have great technique or pictorial qualities to get nice designs..." she says. The benefit of her business is that she does her work by request. The drawback is her lack of capital to be able to invest and and improve her sales. Her dream is to open a sales shop with a roof. She would like to invest in her business by buying canvas painting supplies such as paint, paint brushes, canvas, and other items. This is her 3rd cycle of loans with the institution in the 5 years she has been doing this work.

For these reasons, Mercedes is requesting a loan to buy canvas painting supplies to open a sales shop with a roof.

loans.use: to buy canvas painting supplies to open a sales shop with a roof.

loans.name: Blanca Nieve Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Blanca Nieves está conformado por cinco mujeres emprendedoras, coordinado por Humbelina de 53 años de edad, quien es propietaria de una pulpería desde hace cinco años. Por décima vez solicitan el financiamiento de ADIM, con los créditos anteriores logro aumentar la oferta de productos en el negocio, actualmente el crédito lo solicita para la compra de arroz, aceite, azúcar, gaseosa y queso, la segunda socia es María de 50 años quien se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, la tercer socia es Reyna de 47 años quien es propietaria de una pulpería, María es la cuarta socia de 44 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de comida y la última socia es Nieves de 50 años de edad quien se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos.
texts.en:
The Blanca Nieves group is comprised of five enterprising women.  Humbelina, age 53, is the coordinator.  She has had a grocery store for five years.  She is requesting a loan from ADIM for the tenth time.  With the previous loans she managed to increase the products she sells in the business.

She is currently requesting the loan to buy rice, cooking oil, sugar, soft drinks, and cheese.

María, age 50, is the second member.  She sells used clothes.  The third member is Reyna, age 47.  She has a grocery store.  María, age 44, is the fourth member.  She sells food.  The last member is Nieves, age 50.  She sells clothes and shoes.

loans.use: to buy rice, cooking oil, sugar, soft drinks, and cheese.

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es: Maria tiene 34 años de edad es soltera tiene 4 hijos vive en Guaranda provincia de Bolivar en la Comunidad Pucarapamba , ella se dedica a la agricultura y a la cria de animales, solicita el crédito para la compra de una vaca para engordarla y luego venderla, su sueño es comprarse un terreno y los desafios a los que se enfrenta son el clima y el transporte, en su tiempo libre le gusta pasear con su familia.
texts.en: Maria is 34 years old, single and has four children. She lives in Guaranda in the province of Bolívar, in the community of Pucarapamba. She makes a living from agriculture and raising farm animals. She is requesting a loan to buy a cow, to fatten up and then sell. Her dream is to buy herself a plot of land; the challenges she faces are the climate and transport. In her free time she likes going for a walk with her family.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Maria Lucha

texts.es: María Lucha tiene 41 años de edad es casada tiene 5 hijos vive en Guaranda Provincia de Bolivar en la comunidad Pucarapamba, se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganaderia solicita el crédito para la comprta de un reproductor para sus vacas y mejorar la raza, gracias al credito podra mejorar su ganado y su agricultura los desafios a los que se enfrenta es el mal tiempo y el transporte, en su tiempo libre le gusta tejer.
texts.en: María Lucha is 41 years old, married and has five children. She lives in Guaranda in the Province of Bolivar in a community called Pucarapamba. She works in agriculture and raising cattle. She is requesting a loan to buy a breeding bull for her cows to improve their breeding. Thanks to the loan she will be able to improve her cattle and her farming. The challenges she faces are bad weather and transportation. In her spare time she likes to read.

loans.use: to buy a breeding bull.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two heifers.

loans.name: Tercio Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario tercio está conformado por tres mujeres laboriosas, coordinado por Roxana de 25 años de edad, casada quien se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace cuatro años, solicitan por octavo ciclo el financiamiento de ADIM, uno de los logros con los créditos anteriores fue aumentar la oferta de ropa en su negocio, esta vez solicita el crédito para la compra de trajes de niña, pantalones y sandalias, las socias del grupo son Nelsy de 27 años y kembeling de 22 años, quienes se dedican a la venta de comida.
texts.en: The solidario tercio group is comprised of three hard working women. It is led by Roxana who is 25, married and has made her living selling clothing for the last four years. They are requesting financing from ADIM for the eighth cycle. One achievement with previous loans was to increase the selection of clothing in their store. This time they are requesting a loan to buy girls clothing, pants and sandals. The group members are Nelsy, 27 and Kembeling, 22 who both sell food.

loans.use: to buy girls clothing, pants and sandals.

loans.name: Nurzhan

texts.ru: Нуржан, 27 лет, замужем, 3 детей. Уже 10 лет она занимается животноводством и полеводством, супруг активно помогает по бизнесу. В хозяйстве Нуржан есть 15 овец, 3 коровы, лошадь. На 0,82 Га земли она выращивает люцерну. Благодаря упорному труду, Нуржан на сегодняшний день имеет прибыль около 7,700 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку материалов для расширения сарая для содержания скота. Доходы от бизнес деятельности Нуржан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и посадку картофеля для реализации.
texts.en: Nurzhan is 27, married, and has three children. She has been raising livestock and planting crops for ten years already, and her spouse helps her with the business. Nurzhan has 15 sheep, 3 cows, and a horse. She crows alfalfa on a 0.82 hectare plot of land. Thanks to her hard work, she earns 7,700 som (KGS) per month. In order to develop her business, she applied for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) with Bai Tushum Bank to buy construction materials to expand her livestock barn. She plans to use the profits from her business activities to invest in the future development of her business and to plant potatoes to sell.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to expand her barn

loans.name: Walter Ernesto

texts.es: Walter de 28 años de edad vive en casa propia  con su grupo familiar conformado por 7 personas. Walter es un joven emprendedor y visionario que gracias a su esfuerzo está saliendo adelante y apoyando a su familia en lo que puede, actualmente se dedica como instructor de baile en una escuela de danza cercana a su vivienda y con la paga que recibe aporta a su vivienda con los gastos que se realizan. Walter anteriormente obtuvo un crédito para  colocar ladrillo de piso por lo que tuvo que invertir en cemento, y arena, Walter se siente muy agradecido ya que gracias al crédito pudo realizar su objetivo, lo cual lo ha motivado a seguir mejorando su vivienda y a tomar la decisión de solicitar un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para comprar cemento, arena y ladrillo para repellar las paredes de la casa y poder terminar la construcción de su baño sanitario el cual le brinde una mayor higiene a su familia.
texts.en:
Walter is 28 years old and lives in his own house with his family which is made up of seven people. Walter is a young entrepreneur and visionary who thanks to his efforts is getting ahead and supporting his family as much as he can. He presently works as a dance instructor in a dance school close to his house and with the money he receives he contributes to the household expenses.

Walter previously got a loan to install a brick floor when he had to invest in cement and sand. Walter feels very grateful as thanks to the loan he could achieve his objective. This has motivated him to continue to make improvements to his house and he has taken the decision to request a new loan from FUSAI. He will buy cement, sand and bricks to plaster the walls of his house and finish construction of a bathroom which will provide better hygienic conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and bricks to plaster the walls of his house and finish construction of a bathroom.

loans.name: Hermanos En Cristo Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Hermanos en cristo está conformado por dos mujeres emprendedoras y un señor trabajador, El grupo es coordinado por Ángela de 51 años de edad, casada y madre de tres hijos, es una mujer trabajadora que con la venta de un terreno emprendió su negocio, el cual es comercialización de prendas, ropa y zapatos desde hace 10 años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de anillos, aretes, pulseras, perfumes y zapatos. Con el crédito anterior logro la compra de un juego de sofá. La tercer socia es Merling quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y zapatos, el tercer socio es don Álvaro es taxista
texts.en: The solidarity group Hermanos En Cristo (Brothers in Christ) is made up of two women entrepreneurs and one hard-working man. The group is coordinated by Ángela, who is 51 years old, married and the mother of three children. She is a hard-working woman who, by selling some land, was able to set up her own business ten years ago, selling jewellery, clothes and shoes. She is requesting a loan to buy rings, earrings, bracelets, perfumes and shoes. With her previous loan she managed to buy a sofa set. The second member is Merling, who makes a living selling cosmetics and shoes; the third member is Álvaro, who is a taxi driver.

loans.use: to buy rings, earrings, bracelets, perfumes and shoes.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a proud mother and a very supportive wife. There is nothing she dreams of but to take her family out of poverty. That's why she really helps her husband in finding out ways to earn an income.

Previously, Teresita was given a chance to borrow a loan that she used to improve her small sari-sari store. She is indeed thankful to have you a part of her business as helping hands. This time, she wants to take a loan again that she would utilize in buying grocery items to sell in larger quantities. She truly hopes that you grant this request. A 32,000 PHP loan would become a big help for her family. 

Someday, Teresita wants her children have good lives but they can't acquire this in just a snap. Of course, they need to finish their studies. Looking ahead at this, Teresita does everything to give them a good education. She also wants to grow her business.

Teresita meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Amie

texts.en:
Amie is 36 years old and married with three children who are in school. Amie works very hard to provide for them.

Amie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell like soap, milk, canned goods, eggs, noodles, etc. She has been in this business for three years. 

In the future, Amie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like soap, milk, canned goods, eggs, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane lives and works on a two acre farm in the Kaptumo village in Kenya. She keeps dairy and poultry animals, and also grows tea. She sells her farm produce at a local market near her home. She started farming 18 years ago, and through the years she has had no difficulty in satisfying her customers’ needs. 

The biggest growth constraint for Jane is the lack of access to capital to buy the agricultural inputs necessary to increase her farm’s productivity. She lives in a part of Kenya where there are no banks. She is seeking a loan to buy improved seeds, fertilizers and other important inputs that control weeds and pests. 

With your lending, Jane will be able access capital to buy important farm inputs that will increase her farm’s productivity and family income.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Jose Salustio

texts.es: Jose es un señor que nunca se caso ni tampoco tuvo hijos, Jose se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenia 14 años de edad, en la actualidad Jose tiene 46 años y comenta que  vive con un hermano y con 4 sobrinos, Jose cometa que les quiere mucho a sus sobrinos como si fueran hijos, asi que les apoya con lo que le alcanza, Jose solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de abono, fungicidas y pago de mano de obra a quienes le ayudan a trabajar en sus cultivos, la meta de Jose es la de trabajar y mejorar su negocio para a futuro lograr comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando y de ser posible una casa para pasar allí su vejez.
texts.en:
Jose is a man who never married or had children. 

Jose has been farming since he was 14 years old. He is currently 46, and lives with one of his brothers and four nephews. Jose says he loves his nephews very much, as if they were his own children, and so he helps them with whatever he can. 

Jose will use the money from this loan to buy fertilizer and fungicides, and to pay the laborers who help him work his crops. 

Jose's goal is to work to improve his business so that, in the future, he can buy a piece of land and continue farming as well as building a house where he can live in his old age.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fungicides.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new trawl and rope and to fix old equipment.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 27-year-old single man who works selling and maintaining mobile phones. He also provides money transfer services and has been operating his businesses for the past three years. Ali is an ambitious man who has succeeded throughout the years to gain loyal customers and cover his needs and expenses.

Ali is requesting a youth loan from the Kiva partner Al Majmoua to decorate his shop which will help develop his business and attract more customers.  In the future, he hopes to expand his business to increase his income and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to decorate his shop to attract more customers

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is 45 years old and married with one child. For the past eight years, she has run a general store in the Philippines and she also earns an income from buying and selling charcoal. Conchita has borrowed and repaid six previous loans from NWTF. She works hard to provide for her family. 

Conchita is requesting a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell such as canned goods, chips, milk, sugar, coffee, and other prodcuts. She aspires to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, chips, milk, sugar, coffee, and other items

loans.name: Judelyn

texts.en:
A little spark of dream can light up a fire of passion. 

Meet Judelyn. She is 37 years old and currently living in Parañaque City, Philippines. She is blessed with three kids. Judelyn sells various kinds of food products like biscuits and peanuts. The consolidated income she earns is what sustains her household. Being passionate enough to win her dream, she makes sure that she does everything she can to earn money. 

Today, Judelyn wants to develop her business. However, she can't do this alone. She needs people like you. If you'll consider, she would like to take a loan amounting to 25,000 PHP. She would utilize this to buy more quantities of food products to sell. She believes and is truly hopeful that she is not wrong in choosing to ask for help from individuals like you. 

Judelyn regularly meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week.All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more quantities of food products to sell.

loans.name: 04 Phú Vượng, Hưng Lộc Group

texts.en:
Loan is 36 years old and married. She lives in Han Loc district, in a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. For the past 10 years, Loan has worked raising poultry. Her family’s income is low and the market demand is low in her region. Loan’s major hardship is the lack of capital. 

Loan is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet. This will be her first loan with the Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. In the future, Loan hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to buy more supplies for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet

loans.name: Nhóm 6 Thôn 3Tn-Quảng Vinh Group

texts.en:
Nhung is 50 years old and married. She lives in Quan Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. For the past 5 years, Nhung has worked raising poultry. Her family’s income is low and the market demand is low in her region. Nhung’s major hardship is the lack of capital. 

Nhung is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet. She joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution in 2014, and has successfully repaid two loans. In the future, Nhung hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María es una mujer de cincuenta y un años de edad, que posee un negocio familiar, en el cual elaboran dulces, caramelos y cajetas nicaragüenses. Al lado de su esposo, hermano y sus cinco hijos han logrado mantener a flote sus ventas. Gracias a los préstamos de Kiva y MiCrédito pudo captar nuevos clientes porque elaboro más productos, con mejor calidad, de manera que su fábrica artesanal de caramelos creció notablemente. 
Como María vio que fue muy factible elaborar una mayor cantidad de sus productos, ha vuelto a solicitar un préstamo para comprar sacos de azúcar, colorante, dulce en barra, entre otras cosas que utiliza como materia prima. Ella pretende seguir trabajando con la ayuda de créditos, hasta poder ver realizado su sueño de hacer de su negocio una fábrica equipada con máquinas y tener una tienda de café.
texts.en:
María is a 51 year old woman. she has a family business where she makes candies, caramels and cajetas (a local sweet). Together with her husband, brother and her five children they manage to keep up the sales. Thanks to a loan from Kiva and MiCrédito she was able to attrct new clients since she made more products with higher quality. Sales of her handmade caramels grew notably.

As María sees that it is quite feasible to make a greater quantity of her products, she has requested another loan to buy bags of sugar, dyes and candies amongst other things which she will use as raw material. She hopes to continue working with the support of the loans until she can achieve her dream of making her business into a factory equipped with machinery and open a store selling coffee.

loans.use: to buy sacks of sugar, dye, and candies amongst other things.

loans.name: Hilda Maria

texts.es: María tiene 54 años de edad,  María esta casada y tiene  5 hijos  mayores de edad, María vive con su esposo, 2 hijos y 3 nietos, el esposo de María trabaja en la agricultura, María vive en el campo y sus ingresos los obtiene de la venta de leche que la  obtiene de sus vacas,  María solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de una vaca,  María comenta que hace un mes la operaron ya que tenia una enfermedad, pero en la actualidad ya se esta recuperando y comenta que sus hijos y su esposo le dan gran apoyo cuidando su ganado. Lo que mas le preocupa a María  es recuperarse y seguir en su negocio ya que la última de sus hijas que tiene 19 años aun está estudiando y Maria tiene que cubrir los gastos de la educación para que ella termine sus estudios.
texts.en:
María is 54 years old, married and she has 5 adult children.  She lives with her husband, 2 of her children and 3 grandchildren.  María’s husband works in agriculture.  María lives in the countryside and she obtains her income from selling milk from her cows.  María is requesting the loan money to invest in the purchase of a cow.  

María mentions that she had an operation a month ago as she was ill but currently she is recovering and she says that her children and her husband are giving her great support caring for her livestock.  What most concerns María is recovering and continuing in her business as the last of her children, 19 years old, is still in school and María has to cover the expenses of her education so that she can finish her studies.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Blesing Group

texts.es:
El grupo solidario Blesing, es un grupo mixto integrado por 2 mujeres y 2 varones emprendedores (Indiana del Carmen, Eveling, Marvin Alfonso y Erick Javier) de la etnia miskita de la ciudad de Bilwi, en el municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Son hombres y mujeres emprendedoras que luchan día a día por hacer crecer sus pequeños negocios de venta de ropa usada, accesorios y reparación de celulares, venta de electrodomésticos, de ropa y calzado; se organizaron hace 1 año para accesar a préstamos con garantía solidaria en Pana Pana.

Indiana del Carmen: Es la coordinadora del grupo solidario, es una señora de  27 años de edad, con cualidades de líder. Casada con 2 hijos: El mayor de ocho años estudia su tercer grado de primaria y un pequeño de tres años de edad. Su pareja es asalariado. Con el propósito de contar con su propia fuente de ingresos y contribuir con los gastos del hogar y educación de sus hijos, desde hace 5 años se dedica a la venta de ropa usada en su tramo que tiene en uno de los mercados de Bilwi. Solicita financiamiento para comprar una paca mixta en Managua y venderla a precios accesibles a su clientela de Bilwi. Ella sueña con ser una comerciante exitosa.
texts.en:
The Blesing group is a mixed group comprised of two enterprising women and two enterprising men (Indiana del Carmen, Eveling, Marvin Alfonso, and Erick Javier).  They are of the Miskita ethnicity, and they are from the city of Bilwi in the Puerto Cabezas municipality.  They are enterprising men and women who struggle day to day to make their small businesses grow.  Their businesses are selling used clothes, repairs and accessories for cell phones, selling domestic appliances, and selling clothes and shoes.  They organized themselves one year ago in order to have access to loans with a group guarantee in Pana Pana.

Indiana del Carmen is the coordinator of the group.  She is 27 years old and has the qualities of a leader.  She is married and has two children.  The oldest is eight years old and is in the third grade.  She also has a little three year old.  Her life partner is a salaried employee.  In order to have her own source of income and to contribute to the household expenses and her children’s educational expenses, she has been selling used clothes for five years.  She sells at a space she has at one of the Bilwi markets.

She is requesting a loan to buy a mixed bundle in Managua.  She will sell it for affordable prices to her customers in Bilwi.  She dreams of being a successful merchant.

loans.use: to buy a mixed bundle of clothes in Managua.

loans.name: Keng Group

texts.en:
Khamdeng understands the difference a water filter can make for his family and for his group’s families. Khamdeng knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption, and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.

The water filter Khamdeng purchased will increase his family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or by decreasing the time and cost spent foraging for firewood. The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.

Khamdeng is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and that the filter is guaranteed for two years – so he and his group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so they can have access to safe drinking water

loans.name: Walter Andres

texts.es:
Desde el patio de la casa de Walter, se puede sentir el olor de su rica comida, el desde una temprana edad encontró su pasión por la cocina y al lado de su esposa decidió hacer realidad su sueño que era tener un propio lugar donde pudiese vender sus deliciosos platillos. El encontró en Kiva y MiCrédito un aliado indispensable, para el crecimiento de su negocio.
En estos momentos, Walter, solicita un crédito a Kiva junto a MiCrédito para comprar verduras, granos básicos, aceite, carnes, utensilios de cocina, entre otras cosas. Él es un hombre decidido que trabaja duro para hacer de su comideria un restaurante y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
From the patio of Walter’s house you can perceive the smell of his delicious food.  At an early age he found his passion for cooking.  He decided, with his wife, to make his dream of having his own place where he could sell his delicious dishes a reality.  In Kiva and MiCrédito he found an ally that is indispensable to the growth of his business.

Walter is now requesting a Kiva loan with MiCrédito in order to buy vegetables, basic grains, cooking oil, meat, and kitchen utensils, among other things.  He is a man who is determined to work hard to make his eatery a restaurant and to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, basic grains, cooking oil, meat, and kitchen utensils, among other things.

loans.name: Srbuhi

texts.en:
Srbuhi lives with her husband. She recently started a small business selling different kinds of cosmetics products and skin care creams. Srbuhi organizes and sells from her house and has number of good clients who prefer to purchase needed goods solely from her. 

Srbuhi is requesting a loan from local financial institutions to purchase a new stock of cosmetics and skin care products for her clients. She hopes to expand her business. Srbuhi’s loan has been approved within the framework of joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. This start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to fund informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and skin care products

loans.name: Nhã

texts.en:
Mrs. Nhã is 46 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture, farming food for more than 10 years.

Nhã lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, this region often has suffered natural disasters, such as storms, because it is near the sea. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine.

This is Nhã's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

Along with her business profit, Nhã hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to maintain a successful business, and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase a clean water filter machine

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en:
Mrs. Thanh is 42 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture, farming food, for more than 10 years.

Thanh lives in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, this region often suffers natural disasters such as storms because it is near the sea. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine.

This is Thanh's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

With her business profit, Thanh hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to maintain a successful business, and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase a clean water filter machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy many vegetables to stock, such as tomatoes, chilis, cabbages, etc.

loans.name: Khoa

texts.en:
Mrs Khoa is 65 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture, farming food, for more than 10 years.

Khoa lives in the Hoang Hoa district, in a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in a village. Moreover, this region has often suffered from natural disasters, such as storms, because it is near the sea. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a water purifier. This is Khoa's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profits, Khoa hopes to maintain a successful business and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase a water purifier.

loans.name: Ana Celia

texts.es:
Ana, de 65 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, es viuda desde hace 14 años, tuvo 3 hijos de los cuales solo uno vive con ella y una nieta.

Ana, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 41 años, aprendió está actividad desde que era pequeña, pues su padre fue un agricultor y desde entonces le enseño esa labor y mientras su esposo estaba con vida, ella le colaboraba a realizar el trabajo.- Ella no tiene otra actividad económica y debido a la edad necesita ayuda de mano de obra. 

Ana, necesita el crédito para comprar abono, fertilizantes, semilla, foliares y contratar mano de obra para sembrar maíz y frijol.- El préstamo mejorara sus ingresos porque tendrá lo necesario para cultivar y así asegurar la alimentación de su familia.

Ella, sueña con colocar un puesto de venta de granos básicos en el municipio donde vive, además desea que su nieta estudie y se prepare académicamente.
texts.en:
Ana, who is 65 years old, studied up to the second grade, has been a widow for 14 years, and has 3 children (of which only one lives with her) and a granddaughter.
Ana has worked in agriculture since she was 41, but she learned the trade when she was young because her father was a farmer and he taught her this work. While her husband was alive, she collaborated with him to get the work done. She has no other economic activity and because of her age she needs assistance with the labor.
Ana needs the loan to buy manure, fertilizers and seeds, and to hire laborers to sow maize and beans. The loan will improve her income because she will have everything she needs to farm and thereby guarantee food for her family.
She dreams of setting up a stall selling basic grains in the town where she lives, and she also wants her granddaughter to study and prepare herself academically.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers and seeds, and to hire laborers to sow maize and beans.

loans.name: Lương

texts.en:
Mrs Lương is 40 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture, farming food, for more than 10 years.

Lương lives in the Hoang Hoa district, in a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in a village. Moreover, this region has often suffered from natural disasters such as storms, because it is near the sea. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a water purifier. This is Lương's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profits, Lương hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to maintain a successful business, and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase  a water purifier.

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en:
Mrs. Thanh is 33 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture, farming food, for more than 10 years.

Thanh lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, this region often suffers natural disasters such as storms because it is near the sea. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine.

This is Thanh's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

With her business profit, Thanh hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to maintain a successful business, and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase a clean water filter machine

loans.name: Thảo

texts.en:
Mrs Thảo is 44 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture, farming food, for more than 10 years.

Thảo lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, this region often suffers natural disasters such as storms because it is near the sea. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having clean water to drink. She is requesting a loan to purchase a clean water filter machine.

This is Thảo's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

With her business profit, Thảo hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to maintain a successful business, and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase a clean water filter machine

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
José tiene 47 años de edad, conviviente, con hijos dependientes, vive en una zona rural del distrito de Lagunas que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

José se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como pollos, gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como gallinas, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto José espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
José is 47 years old, is in a common-law relationship and has dependent children. He lives in a rural part of the district of Lagunas which is located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region on the North Coast of Peru. The inhabitants of the district work mainly in agriculture, raising livestock and commerce.

José works raising and selling small animals like chickens, hens, ducks and turkeys amongst others. His business is located at his house. He has ten years experience in the business and very good personal and work references from the area.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a greater number of animals like hens, ducks, turkeys and chickens amongst others as well as balanced feed for them. Doing this José hopes to offer a better product to his clients which will allow him to generate greater income and in the end improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a greater number of animals as well as balanced feed for them.

loans.name: Quỳnh

texts.en:
Quỳnh is 25 years old, and he is married. He has been working in agriculture for more than 10 years, raising poultry.

Quỳnh lives in Quang Xuong district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoá province. His family's household is low-income, in a village, and his income is unstable.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns Quỳnh is that their lartrine is not hygienic. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick, and equipment to build a toilet. This is his first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

Quỳnh's hopes are for both his business to do well and his family to be healthy and happy, and also to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick, and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Vân

texts.en:
Mrs Vân is 41 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for 10 years.

Vân lives in Bim Son town, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in a village, and her job is unstable. She has no collateral and can't get loans from other banks or credit institutions.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

In 2014, Vân joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business, and has successfully repaid two loans. With her business profits, Vân hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Sanzhar

texts.ru: Санжар, 42 года, женат, отец 3 детей. Санжар работает электриком, также в качестве дополнительного дохода уже 14 лет вместе с супругой занимаются сельским хозяйством. На сегодняшний день у Санжара есть 3 коровы, 10 овец, 6 коз. На 0,40 Га земли выращивают кукурузу. Ежемесячная прибыль - 7,800 сом (KGS). Санжар обратился в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для увеличения поголовья скота. Санжар является лидером группы "Берлин", всего в группе 3 человека. Доходы от кредита позволят Санжару улучшить благосостояние и жилищные условия семьи.
texts.en: Sanzhar is 42, married, and a father of three. He is an electrician and has been farming with his wife for 14 years to supplement their income. Sanzhar currently has three cows, ten sheep, and six goats and grows corn on a 0.4 hectare plot of land. His monthly income is 7,800 som (KGS). Sanzhar applied for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) with Bai Tushum Bank to buy calves and increase his livestock headcount. Sanzhar is the leader of the “Berlin” group, which consists of three people. The earnings from the loan will help Sanzhar improve his family’s welfare and living conditions.

loans.use: to buy calves in order to increase his herd

loans.name: Nelida

texts.es:
Nelida tiene 39 años de edad, vive con su cónyugue y sus tres menores hijos en una zona rural, en el Sector Corral de Palos del distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Nelida se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como pollos, gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como gallinas, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Nelida espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Nelida is 39 years old and lives with her husband and three underage children in a rural area in the Sector Corral de Palos in the Cayaltí district. This is located in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Perú. The inhabitants of this district largely work in agriculture, ranching and the commercial sector.
Nelida works in the breeding and sales of small animals such as chickens, hens, ducks and turkeys, among others, and her business is located at her home. She has 10 years of experience in the business and very good personal and work references in the area.
The loan which she seeks would be used to buy a large quantity of animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys and chickens, among others, as well as to buy a balanced diet for them. With this Nelida hopes to offer a better product to her customers which will permit her to generate more income and as a result improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of animals and food to fatten them up.

loans.name: Ana Nelida

texts.es:
Hoy es quizás uno de los días más importantes para la señora Ana pues está a un paso de consolidar uno de sus más preciados sueños el cual es tener un negocio propio, por ello pide ayuda a la comunidad Kiva para que la apoyen en un préstamo que pagara puntualmente y el cual destinara para abrir su negocio de café-bar.

Tu ayuda servirá para Ana compre surtido de bebidas alcohólicas, cigarrillos y lo más importante es que si le das tu sí te apoyo, una familia colombiana tendrá un negocio para buscar un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Today is perhaps one of the most important days for Ana since she is one step closer to establishing one of her most cherished dreams which is to have her own business. This is why she is asking the Kiva community to support her with a loan which she will pay back promptly and which she will use to open her business of café-bar. 

Your help will allow Ana to purchase an assortment of alcoholic beverages, cigarettes, and more importantly, is that if you give her your support, a Colombian family will have a business to seek a better future.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of alcoholic beverages and cigarettes.

loans.name: Tomás

texts.es:
Tomás es un gran hombre trabajador y muy amable que vive en San Andrés Semetabaj junto a su linda familia de siete hijos de los cuales son tres hombres y cuatro mujeres; para Tomás no hay nada más importante que su amada familia y para darles lo mejor trabaja como jornalero desde hace 20 años, pero afortunadamente él también cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa que trabaja elaborando blusas típicas, con estos dos ingresos han sacado adelante a su familia, pero para seguir  mejorando solicitan un préstamo que lo invertirán en la compra de fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra para el cultivo de maíz.
El gran sueño de Tomás es poder comprar más terreno para incrementar su cultivo y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Tomás is a great man, hard-working and very kind. He lives in San Andrés Semetabaj with his beautiful family of seven children: three boys and four girls. For Tomás nothing is more important than his beloved family and, to give them the best, he has been working for 20 years as a day labourer. Fortunately he also has the support of his wife, who works making traditional blouses, and, with these two incomes, they have got the family ahead. However, to continue improving they are requesting a loan to invest in buying fertilizers and paying workers for the maize cultivation.

Tomás's great dream is to be able to buy more land, to increase his crops and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay workers

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un gran hombre de 35 años de edad, es soltero y vive junto a su linda familia en una comunidad del departamento Sololá.
Francisco para poder obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica, él tiene tres años de ejercer este humilde labor, esta actividad lo realiza el desde su casa de habitación. Francisco con el afán de seguir prosperando ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para poder comprar hilos de diferentes tipos y colores para seguir elaborando y vendiendo ropa típica de su región.
El gran anhelo de Francisco es poder mejorar sus ingresos y remodelar su vivienda para ofrecerle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Francisco, 35 years old, is a great man who is single and lives with his lovely family in a community in the department of Sololá.

Francisco, in order to obtain income and get his family ahead, makes a living buying and selling traditional clothing.  He has been working in this humble job for three years and does it from his home.  

Francisco, eager to continue prospering, has made the decision to request a loan to be able to buy threads of different types and colors to continue making and selling traditional clothing from his region. 

Francisco’s great desire is to be able to improve his income and remodel his home to offer his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase different types and colors of thread.

loans.name: Muñecas Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario está conformado por 4 mujeres emprendedoras (SECILIA, DELFINA, LINDA LENITA y ROSAURA), viven en la comunidad de Lamlaya, en vocablo miskito significa “Agua Mansa”, del municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Se unieron hace 6 meses con el propósito de trabajar de manera solidaria para acceder a préstamos en Pana y tener la oportunidad de mejorar sus pequeños negocios, mejorar sus ingresos y así mejorar la calidad de vida de sus familias.

ROSAURA: Es la coordinadora del grupo solidario, es una joven de 23 años de edad, con cualidades de líder, casada. Su esposo trabaja como comerciante. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos desde hace 3 años, vende en uno de los mercados de Bilwi pescado y mariscos, de esta manera genera ingresos propios y contribuye con los gastos del hogar. Esta solicitando financiamiento para comprar más mariscos y pescados para vender más, incrementar sus ingresos y tener más clientes que demandan este producto que constituye uno de los alimentos básicos en Bilwi. Su sueño es tener una pulpería.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is made up of four enterprising women (Secilia, Delfina, Linda Lenita, and Rosaura). They live in the community of Lamlaya, which in the Miskito language means "calm waters", in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. They formed the group six months ago with the goal of working together in solidarity in order to access loans from Pana and have the opportunity to improve their small businesses, their incomes, and the quality of life of their families. 

Rosaura is the coordinator of the solidarity group. She is a young woman who is 23 years old, married, and has leadership qualities. Her husband works as a merchant. With the goal of having her own source of income, she has been selling fish and seafood in one of the markets in Bilwi for three years. This allows her to earn her own income and contribute to household expenses. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more seafood and fish in order to sell more, increase her income, and have more customers that demand this product, which is a staple food in Bilwi. Her dream is to have her own small grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase more seafood and fish.

loans.name: Jorge Alejandro

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajador, así es Jorge, un hombre guerrero que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a salir adelante, vive en el municipio de San Antonio De Prado, donde se gana la vida con la venta de carne.

Sus productos son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su carnicería porque saben que podrá obtener una carne de muy buena calidad.

Jorge ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, por esta razón acude a un préstamo para poder pagar los tramites del registro sanitario de su negocio (INVIMA).
Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar trabajando

Apoya a este hombre con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Humble and hard-working: that's Jorge, a man with a fighting spirit who has spent a great deal of his life trying to get ahead. He lives in the municipality of San Antonio De Prado, where he earns his living selling meats. 

His products are well-known to his neighbors throughout the area, who frequent his butcher shop because they know they will get very high-quality meats there.

Jorge has decided to improve his business and increase his sales, and for that reason he is seeking a loan to pay for the fees for a sanitary registration through INVIMA, a government agency. 

This loan will help him develop his business and earn the necessary income that will allow him to continue working. 

Support this man with a loan and make his dreams come true!

loans.use: pay the fees for a sanitary registration for his business with INVIMA, a government agency regulating food products

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es:
Reynaldo es un joven hombre joven de 29 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera de ingeniería comercial. 
Él es inteligente, despierto, atento, alegre, feliz, responsable y buen estudiante. Sus estudios los desarrolla en la universidad pública del Alto en la carrera de ingeniería comercial, caracterizada por encontrarse en el centro de la iudad al lado de restaurantes, oficinas, empresas y todo tipo de comercio, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre -4/12 grados centígrados. Reynaldo es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla sólo con sus abuelos porque estudia inglés y habla español porque estudia en la universidad. Su vida la comparte con sus padres que trabajan, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Él estudia la carrera de ingeniería comercial y se encuentra en último año, es un líder con habilidades y destrezas para orientar, planificar, organizar, dirigir y controlar cualquier tipo de negocio, “estudio de día y trabajo el resto del tiempo…” comenta. Paralelamente a sus estudios él trabaja en la confección de ropa de lana para bebé, actividad que realiza por las noches y en sus horas libres. Su sueño es terminar su carrera y trabajar en su negocio, él desea realizar el pago de los gastos para la elaboración de su proyecto de grado para obtener el título profesional. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años de estudios en la universidad. 
Es por esos motivos que Reynaldo solicita un préstamo para realizar el pago de los gastos para la elaboración de su proyecto de grado para obtener su título profesional.
texts.en:
Reynaldo is a 29 year old single man, with no children, who is studying commercial engineering. He is intelligent. alert, attentive, happy, joyful, responsible and a good student.
He is studying Commercial engineering at the Universidad Pública de El Alto which is located in the center of the city amongst restaurants, offices, companies and all types of commerce. It has a cold and dry climate with a daily temperature that varies between -4 and 12 degrees Celsius.

Reynaldo is dark-skinned, has dark eyes, short black hair, is short in stature and thin. His native language is Aymará which he only uses with his grandparents because he is studying English and he speaks Spanish at the university. He shares his life with his parents who work. They live in their own house made of brick with a metal roof that has running water, electricity and sewage.

He is studying commercial engineering and is in his last year. He is a leader with abilities and skills to lead, plan, organize and control whatever type of business. " I study during the day and work the rest of the time" he commented. Besides his studies he works sewing cotton clothing for babies, an activity he does at night and in his spare time.

His dream is to finish his studies and work in his business. He wants to pay the expenses to do his graduate thesis to obtain his professional title. This is his first loan with the institution in his 6 years of study at university. For these reasons Reynaldo is requesting a loan to pay for the expenses of undertaking his graduation thesis to obtain his professional title.

loans.use: to pay for the expenses of undertaking his graduation thesis to obtain his professional title.

loans.name: Karen

texts.es:
Karen proviene de una familia de 7 miembros, es la menor de todos, se desempeña como maquilladora y manicurista en una peluquería. A la vez que trabaja está estudiando la carrera de enfermería.
Ella es una persona muy sacrificada que lucha para poder ser alguien en la vida y mejorar.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder continuar con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Karen comes from a family of seven, she is the youngest. She works as a make-up artist and manicurist at a salon. In addition to working, she attends nursing school. 
She is a person who makes great sacrifices and fights hard to be able to be somebody in life and improve herself. 
She is asking for this loan so she can pay her school fees, and be able to continue with her studies.

loans.use: pay university tuition.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Lourdes está estudiando la carrera de contabilidad, y su deseo es graduarse y poder trabajar para tener un ingreso más estable y así poder invertir en su formación como profesional, que le permita acceder a mejores oportunidades de trabajo.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Lourdes is studying to be an accountant.  Her desire is to graduate and be able to work in order to have a stable income and thus invest in her professional formation, which will help her access better work opportunities.
